so_27458960: how to connect to my university unix server using mac terminal
Top-3 Scripts:
so_27458960: telnet something.something.ac.il 23

telnet -l username something.something.ac.il 23

Explanations about Options.-l:
Specify user as the user to log in as on the remote system. This is accomplished by
 sending the specified name as the USER environment variable, so it requires that the
 remote system support the TELNET NEW-ENVIRON option. This option implies the -a
 option, and may also be used with the open command.

Explanations about Options.-i:
Listen on interface. If unspecified, tcpdump searches the system interface list
 for the lowest numbered, configured up interface (excluding loopback), which may
 turn out to be, for example, ``eth0''.
